Commands.Wound: Magic BRV attack  Target: 2 turns MAX BRV Down I, Poison
Commands.Moonlight: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 1.2 + HP attack  Self: 3 turns ATK Up I
Commands.Ultima Arrow: 7-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Deals 30% HP damage to other enemies.  Deals more HP damage to other enemies if target is broken or gets broken.  Inflicts Light of the Goddess to all enemies for 5 turns.  Light of the Goddess lowers Defense and deals BRV damage every turn.

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Etro's Miracle Boost: Increases the effects of Etro's Miracle by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Wound: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Wound by 10%
Artifacts.Bravery Moonlight: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Moonlight

Passives.Wound Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Wound.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Moonlight Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Moonlight.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Wound Charge: Increases the max uses of Wound by 1.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Moonlight Charge: Increases the max uses of Moonlight by 1.
Passives.Etro's Miracle: Slightly raises Attack and Speed if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Debuff Initiative II: Slightly raises SPD while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Wound Extension: Wound use +2When using Wound:  Moderate damage boost  Slight Poison boost, duration +2  Slight MAX BRV Down boost, duration +2
Passives.All Debuff Boost: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Moonlight Extension: When using Moonlight:  Slightly increased BRV based on ATK  Slightly increased BRV  Slight ATK Up boost; ATK Up granted to party  Granted effects' duration +2

Weapons.Amazon Bow CP: 35: Increases Moonlight's BRV gain, grants it to allies as well and lowers its Action Delay.Increases the potency of Attack Up.Grants all party members Small Max BRV Up for 3 turns.
Weapons.Starseeker CP: 15: Increases the potency of Wound.Increases the potency of Max BRV Down and Poison, and extends their duration.
